alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 4:14PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Webb County through 445 PM CST... At 413 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Ranchitos Las Lomas, or 26 miles east of Laredo, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Webb County. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 800 and 802. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
